p:
All the samples in this paper were prepared by a high-temperature solid-phase reaction. The raw materials needed were BaCO 3 (A.R.), Al 2O 3 (A.R.), SiO 2 (A.R.), Eu 2O 3 (99.99%), H 3BO 3, and Re
x O
y (RE = La, Ce, Pr, Nd, Sm, Gd, Tb, Dy, Ho, Er, Tm, Yb, and Lu) (99.99%). The chemical composition of the sample was Ba (13.35– x– y) Al 30.7Si 5.3O 70: xEu 2+, yRE 3+ (denoted as BASO: xEu 2+, yRE 3+, where x and y are the molar fractions of the dopant).
